mapper.insert: insert into gh_parent_comment (board_id, content, writer) values(#{boardNo}, #{content}, #{writer.no})
mapper.select: select c.comment_id, c.board_id, c.content, c.writer, c.created_date, m.nickname from gh_parent_comment c inner join gh_member m on c.writer = m.member_id order by c.comment_id desc
select c.comment_id, c.content, c.writer, c.created_date from gh_parent_comment c where c.comment_id=#{no}
select c.comment_id, c.content, c.board_id, c.writer, c.created_date, m.nickname from gh_parent_comment c inner join gh_member m on c.writer = m.member_id where board_id=#{no}
